articles.author: Jenny Strasburg In London And Eric Sylvers In Milan
articles.title: Oxford Pauses Dosing in Trial of AstraZeneca Covid-19 Vaccine in Children, Teenagers
articles.description: Concerns about rare blood-clotting issues disrupt small-scale U.K. study of shot in younger people
articles.content:
The University of Oxford said it has paused administering doses of the Covid-19 vaccine it developed with
AstraZeneca
 AZN -0.14%
PLC in a small U.K. study to test the shot in children and teenage… [+7099 chars]
